medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain for 30 hours, starting around the umbilical area and migrating to the right lower quadrant. Fatigue developed 2 days ago, associated with weakness and headache. Nausea occurred when he ate yesterday, but no vomiting. He experienced a fever of 101 at home. Reports anxiety and some shortness of breath, with constipation noted.
